settings.subtitle: New layers and outerwear inspired by a trip to Dorset, Vermont. On the road, in the woods, in town—this is menswear how it’s meant to be made.

settings.text:
We’re proud to collaborate with Corporate Gear to bring your custom embroidery and branding visions to life. Known for their premium service and unmatched attention to detail, Corporate Gear is a trusted destination for luxury apparel personalization. Through this partnership, you’ll have access to a curated selection of the latest B. DRADDY collections—perfect for outfitting your team, enhancing company events, or creating thoughtful executive and employee gifts.

Click below to set up your account and discover how you can make B. DRADDY uniquely yours.

Also known as the Brothers Draddy, B. Draddy looks to the past and its icons for inspiration while using the most modern design techniques. What started with a polo ten years ago has evolved into a full collection of luxe, lived-in essentials for the course and beyond. From organic Peruvian Pima cotton to Italian merino and Scottish cashmere, B. Draddy blends impeccable quality with incredible comfort.
